title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 63.6 - Swine imported from canada
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 63.6 - Swine imported from canada

State Regulations

Swine imported from Canada must meet the following
requirements: (a) be accompanied by an
approved health certificate and be individually identified; and
(b) until such time as Canada is recognized
as pseudorabies free by the United States Department of Agriculture, be
individually tested and found negative for psuedorabies within 30 days prior to
shipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
63.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
